snippet: The decision by a federal appeals court in California increased the likelihood that the Supreme Court will weigh in on the issue.
abstract: Federal appeals court's rejection of a request to review its decision to throw out a voter-approved ban on same-sex marriage in California increases the likelihood that the Supreme Court will weigh in on same-sex marriage in the coming year.
lead_paragraph: The decision by a federal appeals court in California increased the likelihood that the Supreme Court will weigh in on the issue.

headline.seo: Gay-Marriage Issue Moves Closer to Justices
headline.main: Same-Sex Marriage Issue Moves Closer to Justices
headline.print_headline: Same-Sex Marriage Issue Moves Closer to Justices

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
